transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello. Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Boliye. Sir, ye mai ANBY food beverages se baat kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir, aapne na abhi baat hui hogi aapki ek IndiaMART pe kisi ke sath Mahesh Kumar ji hai unse baat hui aapki?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji, to isse call pe jo bhi aapki baat hui hai sir, us baat se aap satisfied nahi the kya?
Customer: Bolne ka unko tarika nahi hai.
Executive: Kya baat hai, to bataiye kya dikkat aayi thi?
Customer: Sir, unko hum bol diya hum nahi karenge to abhi nahi karenge to unko ulta pulta bolne lage. Sorry hum rehne dijiye. Kya hai sir? Unko hum bol diye ki hum kar lenge abhi hum karenge abhi hum baad me karenge baad me karenge.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Ji.
Customer: Hum bol diye to hum bole abhi hum nahi karenge abhi mere paas thoda kuch financially dikkat hai to nahi credit card se pay kar dijiye wo kar dijiye matlab credit card hai. Use hum nahi karenge agar inko kuch kaam hai. Abhi apna plant hum naya setup kar rahe hai usme mera paisa lag raha hai aapko bahut paisa ka need hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Abhi hum nahi kar payenge jab mera jab mera pura naya plant jab setup ho jayega tab hum sab sab properly start karenge.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Aapke account me humne Priya ke sath kaisa hai matlab kaam hai matlab unke sath kaisa kaam hua aapka?
Customer: Thik hai wo.
Executive: Jab unke sath unhi baat hui thi aap se?
Customer: Nahi to feedback
Executive: Unhi ke liye gaya tha sir. Kya ji?
Executive: Ye feedback unhi ke liye gaya tha wo.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Jaise ye jo call pe aapne feedback diya hai sir, feedback aapne diya hai abhi?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapne usko not satisfied mark kiya hai. Thik hai so uske is pe jo bhi aapki baat hui hai. To wo call ka feedback sir jaise account manager to aapki Priya Yadav bhi hai. Right?
Customer: Haan. Haan to unhi se baat hui hogi aapki. Aaj unse baat hui ki nahi aapki?
Customer: Nahi unse baat nahi hui.
Executive: To ye aapka decided hai sir matlab aap isko is time pe band kara denge IndiaMART?
Customer: Haan, baad me karayenge. January February tak me karwayenge abhi nahi.
Executive: Kab tak? January February. Isi GST se?
Customer: Hmm. Isi same GST pe ya koi aur company lekar aa rahe hai?
Customer: Isi GST se.
Executive: Sir band kyu kara rahe hai matlab fir?
Customer: Agar hum naya plant abhi hum naya plant ka isme haath laga rahe hai isme bahut abhi kaam us kaam me fase hue hai abhi hum.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Jaise ispe bhi aap aisa nahi hai ki use nahi kar rahe hai. Daily use bhi kar rahe hai. Abhi bhi dekh raha hu waha portal 6:45 pe aapne open karke baithe hue the.
Customer: Use to aapka ho raha hai IndiaMART.
Executive: Business bhi aapka Priya bata rahi thi yaha pe likha hua proper updated hai ki usse bhi aapki baat chit achi hai aur use bhi aapko business bhi badhiya mila hai.
Customer: Kaafi time se aapka baat bhi chal raha hai ki nahi Diwali pe hi baat hui thi nahi aap beech me aap TrustSeal bhi lene wale the. Fir aapka wo plan drop ho gaya TrustSeal ka.
Executive: Baat kuch aur hogi sir thoda sa in deep samajh jaiye aur Priya ko bata dijiye agar waise koi baat hai to. Warna kya hai sir itni badi company chala rahe ho aap ₹35000 aapka issue to nahi hoga. Mai samajh sakta hu ye baat.
Executive: Baat aapki priority bhi IndiaMART nahi hai wo alag cheez hai. But agar ye aapka download ek baar hota hai sir to aapki bani banai jo preferred city location ye sab banti hai wo sab freeze ho jata hai sir. To aapki mehnat thoda sa aapke account manager ki mehnat dono sir kharab ho jati hai aap samajhiye. Bas itni si baat hai aur koi baat nahi. Haan agar unhone kuch aapko aap se baat discussion me kuch aur baatein hui hai to mai unko samjha dunga. Dobara aap se is tarike se baat na ki jaye. Thik hai?
Customer: Nahi Priya ji se koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Mai jinhone bhi abhi aap se baat ki hai mai unhi ki baat kar raha hu. Mai unko bhi samjha dunga is tarike se baat na ki jaye aap se. Thik hai aapka apna personal issue hai koi dikkat nahi hai sir lekin jaise Priya aapka account handle karti hai to aapne jo satisfied ka feedback mark kiya hai wo unhi ko gaya hai. Right?
Customer: Achha thik hai hum isko dal dete hai satisfied kar dete hai.
Executive: Haan to abhi hum aapko dobara se mail dal rahe hai aapke official mail ID pe. Thik hai? Dal dijiye unko satisfied hum kar dete hai.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Baki sir aur koi dikkat bataiye iske alawa?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi thoda kaam hold pe karenge iske baad hi karenge abhi.
Executive: Thik hai. Renewal karane ka achi cheez hai kyuki aapki service jo hota hai na aap promotion ka naam to jante honge marketing ka. Thoda bahut aapko samajh me aata hoga.
Customer: Hum samajh rahe hai sab samajh rahe hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir to wo aapka band ho jata hai. Baat mera hua hai hum thoda sa nahi karwa payenge hum seedha hum kar hum karwayenge jab mera naya plant start hoga na tab usme hum karwayenge. Jaise man lo aapke buyer traffic jo bhi bana hua hai mai aapko simple sa logic batata hu 160 inquiry kareeb 30 me aa rahi hai. Ye pura move ho jata hai sir aapka. Samajh rahe hai aap?
Executive: Jo connected buyer honge aapke Patna me ek do buyer aur mujhe lag raha hai supplier aur bhi hai sir jo IndiaMART pe hai. Mineral ye water bottle me ya purified water me.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai aapko mail drop kar raha hu aap usko ek baar please feedback apna share kariyega. Thik hai? Thik hai. Baki koi dikkat nahi hai sir bas itni baat thi to dikkat. Koi dikkat nahi. Ye Sri Krishna Enterprises aap jante hai unko?
Customer: Kinko?
Executive: Sri Krishna Enterprises apne?
Customer: Nahi. Nahi ye aapke Patna ki hai na.
Executive: Krishna Enterprises nahi jante ye Royal kuch Royal Aqua. Haan. Haan jante hai isko. To ye bhi sir wahi se apne Royal Aqua bhi. Nagoturn me to sir aapke paas mujhe lag raha hai ki ek to aap hi company hai aur Sri Krishna Enterprises hai aur ek hai YN Enterprises. Aur ha sir bhi sir ek KC beverages karke. Dis jari bechte hai wo company ka naam. Misleri na likh ke.
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai. Thik hai nahi sir wo aapka decision hai thik hai wo mai aapko fir bhi feedback share kar raha hu aap please usko revert kariyega. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai sir. Baki kya matlab Priya se aapko koi dikkat nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi koi dikkat nahi hai. Nahi aapne jo feedback share kiya to mujhe laga ki aapka so kuch to koi issue aa gaya aisa achanak se. To isliye maine call karna jaruri samjha aapko. Thik thik. Bhej dijiye dobara. Thik hai sir. Mai bhejwa raha hu sir. Thik hai. Done sir. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not satisfied with executive's tone.

- Wants to temporarily discontinue IndiaMART subscription.

- Cites financial constraints due to new plant setup.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the previous executive's behavior.

- Executive explained the implications of discontinuing subscription.

- Executive offered to send a satisfaction feedback form.

- Agreed to mark the customer as satisfied.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a satisfaction feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, feedback, account, plant, business, gst
